entities.name: goblin rebellion
entities.description: The goblin rebellion is mentioned as a significant event in Britain.

entities.name: shrieking shack
entities.description: The Shrieking Shack is described as the most severely haunted building in Britain.

entities.name: britain
entities.description: Britain is mentioned as a country where the goblin rebellion and haunted buildings are located.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is one of Harry's friends who is present in the conversation.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is one of Harry's friends who is present in the conversation and trying to convince him to sneak out of school.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who is unable to go to Hogsmeade due to lack of permission.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are Harry's relatives who did not sign his permission form.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a person who would not give Harry permission to go to Hogsmeade.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is the head of Gryffindor House and is very strict.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is one of Harry's friends who knows secret passages out of the castle.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is one of Harry's friends who knows secret passages out of the castle.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is a person who is on the loose and Hermione does not think it is safe for Harry to sneak out with him.

relationships.description: Harry's relatives, the Dursleys, did not sign his permission form.
Fudge would not give Harry permission to go to Hogsmeade.
Ron and Fred are friends who know secret passages out of the castle.
Ron and George are friends who know secret passages out of the castle.
Hermione is trying to convince Harry to sneak out of school.
Black is a person who is on the loose and Hermione does not think it is safe for Harry to sneak out with him.
